npm-install-script.message: The package.json has a script automatically running when the package is installed

npm-serialize-environment.message:
This package contains a call to `JSON.stringify(process.env)` which indicates that the whole set of environment
variables are serialized at some point. This can indicate that the package attempts to steal the environment
from the production host.

npm-exfiltrate-sensitive-data.message: This package is exfiltrating sensitive data to a remote server
This package is exfiltrating sensitive data to a remote server
